name: プロデューサー
text:
どうした、咲耶
何か考えごとか？
trans: What's wrong, Sakuya? Are you thinking about something?

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、プロデューサー
ひとつ、質問をしてもいいかな
trans: Yeah, Producer. There is one thing, if I can ask you.

name: 咲耶
text:
プロデューサーは、
人との仲を深めるためには、何が大切だと思う？
trans: Producer, what do you believe is the most important thing to deepen your relationships with people?

text:
相手の立場になって
考えること

name: 咲耶
text:
仲良くなるために、距離を置いてしまうのかい……？
……なるほど、常に一緒にいるだけが友情ではないね
trans: You're saying you need to keep your distance, in order to strengthen your relationships...? I see, camaraderie isn't just about being together all the time.

name: 咲耶
text:
私はつい相手とともに何かをすることばかり考えてしまうが、
そういう考えもあるんだね。新鮮な心持ちだよ
trans: I'm always just thinking about what I can do with the other person, but there's also concepts like that. What a fresh mindset.

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……私もそう思うよ
相手が楽しめれば自分も楽しくなる
trans: Haha... I was thinking that as well. When they are happy it makes me happy as well.

name: 咲耶
text:
これが仲を深めるということの素晴らしさだ
アナタも同じ考えでうれしいよ
trans: That's the wonderful thing about strengthening your bonds with people. I'm happy you feel the same way.

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、他人を理解することはとても大事だね
人と関わる上で、重要な能力と言ってもいい
trans: Yeah, understanding the other person is the most important, isn't it? It's said that that's the most important skill for interacting with others.

name: 咲耶
text:
アナタが、一番得意なことかもしれないね
私も、見習わなければ……
trans: You're one who might be the very best at that, aren't you. I should also follow your example...

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans: (Ah… I should've said something else instead…)
